title: Hello World
algorithmDescription: A straightforward program that outputs a fixed string to console
detailedDescription: Write a program that prints the exact string 'Hello, World!' to standard output. No input processing required.
hints: Use the appropriate print function for your language
The output must be exactly 'Hello, World!' (case-sensitive)
No variables or complex logic needed
commonMistakes: Attempting to read input when not required
solutionApproach: Use a single print/output statement with the exact string. No processing needed.
testCaseCriteria: Must output exactly 'Hello, World!' with proper newline handling

testCases.description: Basic test - no input required, fixed output
